.mobile-header

.l.ogo-content

background-color:pink;

    body {
      font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
      background: #e6f2ff;
      color: #003366;
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
    }
    header {
      background: #004080;
      color: white;
      text-align: center;
      padding: 20px;
      font-size: 1.5em;
    }
    section {
      margin: 20px auto;
      background: white;
      border-radius: 10px;
      padding: 20px;
      max-width: 900px;
      box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
    }
    h2 {
      color: #004080;
    }
    pre {
      background-color: white;
      color:teal;
      padding: 12px;
      border-left: 4px solid #004080;
      overflow-x: auto;
      font-size: 14px;
      border-radius: 6px;
    }
    .example {
      background: #e6f2ff;
      padding: 10px;
      border-radius: 6px;
      margin-top: 10px;
      font-style: italic;
    }
    .explanation {
      background: #f9fcff;
      border-left: 3px solid #0059b3;
      padding: 10px;
      margin-top: 10px;
      border-radius: 6px;
    }
    button {
      background: #004080;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      padding: 8px 15px;
      margin-top: 10px;
      border-radius: 6px;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-size: 14px;
    }
    button:hover {
      background: #0059b3;
    }
    .answer {
      display: none;
      margin-top: 10px;
    }
    footer {
      text-align: center;
      background: #004080;
      color: white;
      padding: 15px;
      margin-top: 20px;
    }
  </style>
